website_summaries.verdict: Earth-friendly coconut shell bowls at a fraction of the cost of similar products from the high-end name stores.
pros: Shells are shaved and sanded so they sit flat
Available in natural or polished, which is more rounded
Spoons are made of sustainable acacia wood
Sizes vary, but are roughly 4.7 to 5.5 inches, perfect for Buddha bowls
Also comes with a free recipe book
cons: Bowls are fragile and may break if dropped

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are amazing! My family eats smoothie bowls every morning and we love eating them out of these bowls. Eating out of the coconut bowls is so much fun and adds to the whole experience since they look so great and tropical. The bowls are easy to use and clean and the best part is that you get to help our planet.
customer_reviews.author: from a reader

customer_reviews.title: Bowl came cracked
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality it came in the mail cracked open. Pretty disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I'M OBSESSED WITH MY BOWLS (:
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute, easy to clean and care for and great for my vegan lifestyle. You can serve a good portion of food and I literally wanna carry one in my purse so I can eat all my meals in thereeee Teehee! I will buy more and give them as gifts too!!! HELPING SAVE THE WORLD ONE COCONUT AT A TIME !
customer_reviews.author: Tati Britner

customer_reviews.title: Incredible buy!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are beyond perfect. Durable, thick, organic. The package also came with instructions to bath bowls in Coconut oil every 10-20 uses to keep its smoothness. I've bought these bowls before and have nothing to complain about. They can be an amazing gift for those who are vegan, waste conscious, or earthly. 100% recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: gabbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute bowels!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order just yesterday and I thank my lucky stars I found these! Everyone in my family are amazed how these bowls are made from coconuts! Even the box smelled like a tropical beach. The spoons are a perfect match. I choose the non smooth texture for a more authentic feel and the finish is wonderful. These bowls are perfect for soup for a dinner party and cereal in the morning. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Razo

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are so cute! They came exactly how I wanted however, they are VERY fragile. I’ve had them for a week and the bottom is already forming a crack. I hand wash them only and dry them quickly so the dampness doesn’t damage them. Very disappointed with the fact that they’re so fragile though :/
customer_reviews.author: Ally D

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bowls and spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Product: My daughter wanted some coconut bowls and we chose these after shopping around. They look great! The included spoons also look really nice. Being natural they are each unique in their shape which makes them all the more special. Coconut bowls are delicate so make sure to handle them according to the instructions and periodically oil them as well. Shipper: We had an issue with our shipment so I emailed CocoBowlCo and they were very responsive and were quick to remedy the issue. Can not speak enough praise to my experience with their customer service. A+ company!
customer_reviews.author: BillC

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I almost got some coconut bowls from coconutbowls.com, but the prices just weren't that appealing, so I checked Amazon. I'm so glad I did cause these are basically the same thing, but for a FRACTION of the cost. I recommend these! Durability wise they seem pretty fragile, but I think that's the case with all coconut bowls. None of mine have cracked yet, but I also just use extra caution, so I would just be mindful and careful.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with the quality and how quickly they arrived. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaR7

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We purchased coconut bowls when we were in Vietnam but can’t purchase more. At that time of our trip we only can purchased 2. Thank goodness for these coconut bowls and we completed 8 for our family. It looks and feel the same bowls we purchased in Vietnam. It also comes with a free recipe ebook.
customer_reviews.author: Cef

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, very well-received
customer_reviews.text: This set of two bowls and two spoons made from coconut make a really nice gift. Either for someone who adores coconut, or a vegan who wants to reduce his/her impact on the planet and proactively consume only sustainable products. The person I gave them to was VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This bowls are nice to look at but not very durable. One has already cracked, without being dropped, just on it's own. The others seem to retain moisture for a long time and the underside of the bowls get what looks like water spots. I like them and I'll use them until I can't anymore but I probably wouldn't order them again.
customer_reviews.author: shain

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my smoothie power bowels! They are so cute, we also used them as the dishes for snacks during my daughters Moana party.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these for my mom as a birthday gift; and she loves them. The craftsmanship is impeccable. I rubbed my hands around them and I couldn't find any blemishes at all. Job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Jèan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute. I absolutely love it! I eat everything on them even things I should probably not eat like hot soup and they are fine! It is so simple but something like this makes you want to eat healthier for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Rainah Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Fun to eat out of novelty gift for sure
customer_reviews.text: So pretty neat to eat out of and spoons are adorable yet functionable
customer_reviews.author: Raw33

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not too sturdy. This is not my go to bowl for acai snacks I make. When i use the spoon i do worry for splinters form the coconut wood. And then bowl does not stand up right . Good for an Instagram pic. Bot good for your food
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service experience, great bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love my new coconut bowls!! They are perfect for smoothie bowls. When I received my order, I saw that one of the bowls had cracked a bit during shipping. I contacted Cocobowlco and they sent a replacement out immediately. The replacement bowl is absolutely perfect. I’m very impressed with this company and highly recommend ordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 4 of my bowls are broken in box
customer_reviews.author: Id

customer_reviews.title: Cool product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow these bowls are pretty small. But they look great. I like the spoons also. Need large bowls now. This is definitely a travel bowl.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAllKindsOfGear

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Just got them yesterday so I don't know how they'll hold up. All I can say is that I love love love them. They're just cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Great set of handmade bowls
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted these and they did not disappoint. However I think I will be purchasing a glossy set to to have the more polished look. The natural kind is great but does look dry I guess. It was completely as advertised however I think I would like the glossy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: So cute and sustainable
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are the cutest! I have now replaced all of my plastic bowls to with these and my cut fruit have never looked better. I also feel like I’m on a vacation when I’m using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value
customer_reviews.text: They are fun and look good with our wooden table and chairs only one complain is that one of the bowls is a little odd shaped than the other but understandable it’s made from a real coconut
customer_reviews.author: Morio Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the earthiness of holding a coconut bowl and how they make smoothie bowls look good. I do wish all of them laid a little flatter on the surface only two do the other two are a little more rounded so they tilt more when on a flat surface but that’s understandable since coconuts are round afterall!
customer_reviews.author: Marquette

customer_reviews.title: In love! Need to order more!
customer_reviews.text: They're so perfect! I love the natural texture of the coconut bowls. The spoons are a perfect match with it as well!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJen

customer_reviews.title: 2/4 BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: The bowls with spoons are really cute, but 2 of the 4 bowls were cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: cute but very small!!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and easy to wash but its super thin and easily breakable. Its like the size of my hand and I have a small hand. Its incredibly thin and and just one drop it'll crack. Not worth the price. I wouldn't recommend buying this for this current price. If I would've known how it was gonna come, I wouldn't have wasted my money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: They are not round and one was not a dark color.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bowls , but the are a little off balance, and one of the bowls wasn't brown its was more of a light than color . I bought in mate.
customer_reviews.author: Nixxy

customer_reviews.title: Spoons not included?
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not come with the spoons that are not only pictured with the bowls, but are also included in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie McKay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this yesterday and it already began to crack. I was wondering why it kept making little noises when it was sitting on the table and realized it was cracking. I am really disappointed as I tried to give this product the benefit of the doubt as I read the reviews. Definitely want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jose33

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bowls and spoons, but I only used them once and one cracked and is not usable anymore... super bummer! Update: they contacted me and replaced my bowls! Amazing customer service! 5 stars!

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Making my food more tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. However, one bowl is smaller and not deep enough compared to the other in my set of two bowls.

customer_reviews.text: First time using the bowl and it'd cracked instantly. I was eating yogurt, granola, and bananas and I could feel the yogurt coming through the cracks. Disappointing. Will be returning.

customer_reviews.text: One bowl was cracked when I received it and took a while to replace after I was told it would be replaced asap... No big deal stuff happens. BUT, I ordered the unfinished set and didn't notice right away, but one spoon was unfinished and one is finished. Not worth the headache to replace spoon.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked spontaneously
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame. I wanted these bowls because I’m trying to be more eco-friendly and I figured they’d be worth the investment, but I was wrong. I’ve had them for less than 1 month and two of them have cracked out of nowhere. Seriously - one was sitting on my counter and suddenly cracked right in front of me, and I found the other one cracked in my cabinet. Giving two stars because the spoons seem perfectly fine. Note that I only put cool foods in these bowls, never hot or warm foods, so according to the directions they never should have cracked.

customer_reviews.title: These are lovely bowls, exactly as advertised

They will always be suspect as they are completely rustic and wild, porous coconut shells. I will probably box them up and wait some years before using them for food. Of course I could use them as decorative.

product_meta.title: Coconut Bowls And Wooden Spoon Sets: 4 Vegan Organic Salad Smoothie or Buddha Bowl Kitchen Utensils (4, Natural)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:4| Color:NaturalBEAUTIFUL COCONUT SHELL BOWLS 
Cocobowlco is delighted to offer you our beautiful, all natural coconut serving bowls. These artisanal coconut shell bowls are ideal for salads, smoothies, buddha bowls, and cereal. Each bowl has a unique natural pattern and make a wonderful addition to your dinnerware sets or picnic baskets. Our coconut bowls are great for decorating or accenting your home or office. The tropical style bowls are also perfect candy dishes, or potpourri bowls. 

ORGANIC SERVING SETS 
Our unique dinnerware sets are perfect for dinner parties, picnics, and brunch. The all natural organic bowls contain zero synthetic materials and are 100% free of parabens or plastics. Organic coconut bowls are easy to clean with soap and water but should not be used in the microwave or dishwasher. Sustainable living meets a touch of island paradise with these organic repurposed coconut shell bowls. 

AVAILABLE IN A NATURAL OR POLISHED FINISH 
Cocobowlco bowls are available in both a polished or natural grain finish. All bowls have a smooth polished interior which is easy to clean and easy to serve from. Select a natural coconut grain or sleek polished exterior in sets of 2 or 4. Polished bowls should be treated with flaxseed or coconut oil after every 20 to 25 washes. 

ACACIA WOOD SPOONS 
Each bowl comes with a 100% antimicrobial acacia wood spoon. These beautiful spoons match the bowls perfectly and are ideal for mixing salads, stirring noodles and pasta and serving your homemade dishes or healthy creations. The durable wooden spoons should also be cleaned with a small amount of soap and warm water and should not be placed in the dishwasher. 

FREE RECIPE EBOOK: Each coconut bowl set comes with a step by step ebook guide to healthy and delicious smoothie bowl and buddha bowl recipes. Use the recipe guide with your ipad, kindle, or laptop to create unique and memorable meals to match your unique bowls.
feature_bullets: OUR NEW COCONUT BOWL GIFT BOX was introduced in October, 2019. NO MORE Plastic, NO MORE Broken Bowls, NO MORE Missing Spoons. Perfect 5 Star Rating Since! Satisfaction Guaranteed or your money back.

UP-CYCLED & ECO FRIENDLY - Normally discarded as trash, we’re bringing these coconut shells back to life in the form of beautiful, all natural serving bowls. Our Cocobowls are 100% Organic and Vegan. All packaging materials are recyclable.

INSTAGRAM WORTHINESS UPGRADE - Create beautiful smoothie bowls, buddha bowls, salads, nice cream desserts and more. Want to take your Instagram profile to the next level? Serve your amazing food creations in a Cocobowl.
NATURAL OR POLISHED - Bowl sets are available in a sleek polished or beautiful natural finish. Our serving sets come complete with our all natural color coordinating ebony wood spoons.

THE PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT - Are you looking for Eco Friendly Gifts, Vegan Gifts, or any other Eco Friendly Products that come in a Gift Box ready to wrap? Be sure to impress your loved one with the amazing gift of a Coconut Bowl by Cocobowlco.
